meanings.sent1: The prebaked cookies were ready to eat without any additional baking.
meanings.sent2: The prebaked pizza crust saved time in preparing dinner.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the prebaked bread was so fast, it must have been baked by a superhero.
meanings.sent4: The prebaked cake was a lifesaver when unexpected guests arrived.
meanings.sent5: The smell of prebaked goods filled the kitchen, tempting everyone to indulge.

meanings.sent1: The prebaked lasagna just needed to be heated in the oven.
meanings.sent2: Using prebaked potatoes made assembling dinner much quicker.
meanings.sent3: He found a creative way to use prebaked muffins as building blocks for a school project.
meanings.sent4: The prebaked pie crust was a solid foundation for the delicious filling.
meanings.sent5: The prebaked bread had a golden crust that made it irresistible.
